headline: PARAMOUNT ANNOUNCES LANDMARK MEDIA RIGHTS AGREEMENT WITH ZUFFA BOXING
summary: Paramount, a Skydance Corporation, ("Paramount") (NASDAQ: PSKY) and TKO Group Holdings, Inc. ("TKO") (NYSE: TKO), a premium sports and entertainment company, today announced a long-term media rights agreement in which Paramount+ will become the exclusive home of Zuffa Boxing throughout the U.S., Canada, and Latin America.
